jobs.name: pivot2-trade-poller
jobs.description: Poll Pivot API for active signals and post committee recommendations

jobs.name: pivot2-morning-brief
jobs.description: Post morning market brief to Discord at 9:30 AM ET

jobs.name: pivot2-eod-brief
jobs.description: Post end-of-day brief to Discord at 5:00 PM ET

jobs.name: twitter-sentiment
jobs.description: Fetch and score Twitter/X sentiment for active tickers

jobs.name: ibkr-position-poller
jobs.description: Poll IBKR positions and balances every 5 min during market hours (UTC). Adjust to 13-20 UTC when DST starts (March 9, 2026).

jobs.name: ibkr-quotes-poller
jobs.description: Fetch IBKR market data quotes every 1 min during market hours (UTC). Adjust to 13-20 UTC when DST starts (March 9, 2026).

jobs.name: yfinance-price-updater
jobs.description: Fetch current prices for non-IBKR positions via yfinance every 15 min during market hours (UTC). Adjust to 13-20 UTC when DST starts (March 9, 2026).
